attributes.action: Stop the destruction of roadside bio-diversity.
attributes.additional_details:
Roadside verges and hedgerows are the last remaining remnants of our long lost grazing meadows, woodlands, marshes, grasslands, wetlands and historically managed agricultural field systems.
The constant destruction of these areas by Council workers / contractors / farmers / tidy minded gardeners and the ever expanding tyre tracks of over laden vehicles is destroying habitats we have signed up to protect under the International bio-diversity agreements.
